How to uninstall this app?
Go to Settings/Security click Device administrators and click AcDisplay so it\'s not checked. Now you can uninstall the app like normal via the apps list or the play store.

What is an active mode?
Active mode uses the device\'s sensors to wake up your device just when you need it. This works great for pulling your device from your pocket to get a quick glimpse at notifications. Active mode doesn\'t lock CPU running so you shouldn\'t see much of a battery difference.
